products.title: Secret Garden Bluegrass Roller Blind
products.description: The secret garden bluegrass roller blind dresses your home in a magical air, so dainty with its colour palette and enchanting with its design. Theres trailing stems decorated with leaves in green and blue, as well as a honeybee or two buzzing around. products.title: Gardenia Inky Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Bright and breezy, the gardenia inky blue roller blind is an absolute gem from their harlequin additions collection. Plus, its a pretty exclusive colourway. The palette consists of a beautiful blue, teal and green, which when together create just enough contrast. products.title: Secret Garden Faux Silk Inky Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Floral designs arent often considered when youre looking for contemporary furnishings, but this stunning and refined roman blind is definitely an exception. The climbing leaf pattern, with its painterly watercolour style, is cast in a palette of modern favourites, teals and floral designs arent often considered when youre looking for contemporary furnishings, but this stunning and refined roman blind is definitely an exception.

products.title: Gardenia Inky Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Bursting with calming tones, the gardenia inky blue roman blind features a lovely array of blue shades, with a touch of green to create a well-rounded display.
